messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Clonlara
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/6/00 6:18:07 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kandpbr@webtv.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/6/00 6:18:07 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kandpbr@...
writes:

<< My wife and I have been looking into Clonlara. Do any of you have any
experience with them that you could share with us. >>
Kyle and Paula,

Yes, this is our first year with Clonlara and with home schooling. They have
been an enormous support and we are planning on continuing. They do have an
unschooling bent.

I'm in the midst of a lot of things here and am not online too much. My
husband's sister passed away last week and I have a serious, and of yet,
undiagnosed problem with my leg. If you have specific questions which I
might attempt to answer, please e-mail me and I'll do my best.

Marcie
